entry.title: Ethereum Still On Track For Mid-September Merge
entry.summary: The Merge is planned for September 19, according to the latest roadmap from Ethereum developers.

entry.title: Multicoin Raises New $430M Web3 Fund
entry.summary: The fund will make investments in web3 infrastructure, DAOs and DAO tooling, consumer products, new IP-based business models, and creator monetization.

entry.title: Senior Video Producer
entry.summary: Job Summary Are you a Senior Producer with avid interest and knowledge of the exciting world of cryptocurrencies and blockchain? If yes, then The Defiant could be the perfect place to put that to work writing, creating, and editing films that capture the zeitgeist. entry.title: What Is Ethereum?
entry.summary: A Step-by-Step Primer on Ethereum's Blockchain, Gas Fees, Scalability and dApps

entry.title: Crypto Lender Celsius Files for Bankruptcy Protection User withdrawals will remain halted.
entry.summary: Celsius, the crypto lender that last month halted withdrawals, has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection, the company said in a press release. User withdrawals will remain halted.
